story: In a realm beyond time, where magic flows like water and dreams take flight
Ancient dragons soar through crystal skies, their scales shimmering with otherworldly light
Deep in the heart of the Eternal Forest, where wisdom whispers through ageless trees
A prophecy unfolds, written in starlight and sealed with destiny's promise
Heroes rise from humble beginnings, their courage tested by trials untold
Through shadow and storm they journey, guided by hope's unwavering flame
Until at last, in the crucible of fate, legends are born anew
title: Epic Tale
